Switch

April 2011

Driven by Rationalism and Power materialism made Selfishness and Arrogance the most worshiped deities.

Driven by Empathy and Modesty post-materialism will made Creativity, Kindness, and Humour the basic skills making our lives better.

This story is about values. With focus on materialism, post-materialism, rationalism, power, self, selfish, arrogance, empathy, modesty, creativity, kindness, humour.
